queries.select: SELECT s.idspesa, s.idtipospesa, s.pezzo, s.quantita, s.data, s.prezzo , t.entrata, t.tipospesa, t.codspesa, t.note as notetipospesa , e.evento, e.note as desevento , u.idutente, u.nome as utente, u.note as desutente , (s.prezzo * isnull(s.quantita, 1)) as totale from spese s left join tipispesa t on t.idtipospesa = s.idtipospesa left join eventi e on e.idevento = s.idevento left join utenti u on u.idutente = s.idutente where s.idutente in ({@method='info',string:userVisibility}) and ('{@qrypar='from'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='from'}' <> '' and s.data >= convert(datetime, '{@qrypar='from'}', 112))) and ('{@qrypar='to'}' = '' or ('{@qrypar='to'}' <> '' and s.data <= convert(datetime, '{@qrypar='to'}', 112))) and ({@valpar='codes'} = 0 or ({@valpar='codes'} = 1 and t.codspesa in ({@qrypar_def='codes'}))) and ({@valpar='not_codes'} = 0 or ({@valpar='not_codes'} = 1 and t.codspesa not in ({@qrypar_def='not_codes'})))
